summary: Automation-ready plan for SauceDemo covering login, product selection, cart review, checkout, and order completion with standard_user credentials.

user_stories.title: Complete a purchase as a standard user
user_stories.goal: log in, add a product to the cart, and finish checkout
user_stories.benefit: verify the end-to-end e-commerce flow works
acceptance_criteria: I can log in with standard_user / secret_sauce and reach the inventory page
I can add at least one product (Sauce Labs Backpack) to the cart and see it there
I can enter shipping details and reach the checkout overview
I can complete the order and see a confirmation message

test_cases.title: Login with standard_user succeeds
test_cases.trace: Basic login flow must allow standard_user to view products.
test_cases.expected_result: User is authenticated and redirected to the inventory page.

test_cases.title: Add Sauce Labs Backpack to cart
test_cases.trace: Core add-to-cart flow for primary catalog item.
steps: Ensure user is on the inventory page
Click 'Add to cart' for the backpack
test_cases.expected_result: Backpack is added to cart and cart badge increments to 1.

test_cases.title: View cart and confirm item details
steps: Click on the shopping cart icon
Confirm cart page displays the added backpack
Verify item name and price are visible
test_cases.expected_result: Cart shows Sauce Labs Backpack with correct price and quantity 1.

test_cases.title: Enter shipping information
test_cases.trace: Checkout Step One collects shipping details.
steps: Click Continue to proceed to overview
Stop at the Checkout: Overview page
test_cases.expected_result: Checkout advances to overview page with order summary displayed.

test_cases.title: Finish order and see confirmation
steps: Review checkout overview items and totals
Click Finish to place the order
test_cases.expected_result: Order completes and displays thank you/confirmation message.

assumptions: Standard SauceDemo credentials (standard_user / secret_sauce) remain valid.
Environment has no anti-bot or additional auth challenges enabled.
Inventory and checkout flows remain at default demo configuration.
risks: If site rate-limits or introduces CAPTCHAs, automated login will fail.
UI element text may change (e.g., button labels) impacting selectors and expectations.
